title: Archer & Bennett Series - Candice Fox
description:
01. Hades [Archer & Bennett, #01] - Candice Fox


â€œCompelling . . . A chilling read.â€ â€”Sydney Morning Herald

Twenty years ago, two children were kidnapped and left for dead.
Raised by a master criminal, they grew up to become cops. Very unusual cops . . .

Homicide detective Frank Bennett has an intriguing new partner. Dark, beautiful, coldly efficient, Eden Archer is one of the most enigmatic colleagues Frank has ever worked withâ€”that includes her brother Eric, whoâ€™s also on the Sydney Metro police force. All of them are tested to the core when a local man discovers a graveyard of large steel toolboxes lying at the bottom of the harbor. Each box contains a grisly trove of human body parts.

For Frank, the madmanâ€™s clues are a tantalizing puzzle. For Eden and Eric, the case holds chilling links to a scarred childhoodâ€”and a murderous mentor named Hades. But the true evil goes beyond the bloody handiwork of a serial killerâ€¦

02. Eden [Archer & Bennett, #02] - Candice Fox


Winner of the Ned Kelly Award

Justice is good. Vengeance is better.

â€œA new murder mystery starâ€”Candice Fox may just be your new literary addiction.â€â€”Primo Life

â€œI fool myself that Eden has a heartâ€”that she would at least have trouble killing me...â€

Most homicide detective teams run on trust, loyalty, and the shared desire to put killers behind bars. Frank Bennett's partner, Eden Archer, thrives on darkness and danger. She has a rare talent for catching killers - but her idea of justice has little to do with courtrooms.

Now three girls are missing, and Eden is going undercover to a remote farm where the troubled go to hide and blood falls more often than rain. Frankâ€™s job is to keep an eye on his partner while she's there - but is it for Eden's protection, or to protect others from her? Walking a tightrope between duty and desperation, Frank confronts a threat from Edenâ€™s pastâ€”the sadistic crime lord Hades, who raised her. Suddenly, the hunter is the hunted. And a killerâ€™s vicious desires are about to be unleashed . . .

The breathtaking new thriller from the author of Hades, winner of the Ned Kelly Award for Best Debut Crime Novel, establishes Candice Fox as a suspense writer of international renown and undisputed power
